Packages
nl.BobbinWork.bwlib.gui Provides generic GUI components and localisation classes used by both applications.
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.conversion  
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.gui Implements the GUI application with swing components.
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.math Provides mathematical components for complex operations to construct the diagram model.
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.model Models how to present the stitches with a pair diagram, thread diagram or descriptive instructions.
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.xml Implements XML manipulations such as conversion to the diagram object model and apply modifications in the diagram on the original DOM tree.
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.xml.expand Implements the affine transformations in the XML DOM-tree.
